title: Sheetroom
description: Assessment platform with a drag-and-drop quiz builder, embeddable graphs and formulas, and a customizable scoring algorithm

title: Nelson Bot
description: Serverless Python bot for automatically reserving your preferred time slots at the Brown Nelson Fitness Center

title: RathDB
description: Optimized storage system to serve as a database for distributed blockchain applications, such as a cryptocurrency

title: Is it GG?
description: Logistic regression machine learning model for predicting whether you won or lost a League game based on your current in-game stats

title: Mixtape
description: Discover new music and quickly create new Spotify playlists with songs you love through a Tinder-like interface

title: Corporate Debt Rating Predictor
description: Logistic regression model that predicts a company's debt rating based on financial report data

title: Venture at Brown
description: Interactive guide to the entrepreneurial resources available to Brown and RISD students on College Hill

title: BrunoCoin
description: A proof-of-concept cryptocurrency miner and wallet written with GoLang. Based on the design described in the Bitcoin whitepaper.
